name: Seeker Adventures
description:
Seeker Adventures is an endless runner video game where the player takes the role of a Seeker and explores new regions, discovers new items and crafts powerful weapons and armor. The graphics of the game are low poly 3D with solid color textures. 

The game runs on Android devices only, downoload is an .apk

This game was made to the subject of 3D Game Project of the course Digital Games and Multimedia in IPL

Game Design and programming by André Jordão

3D Art and UI by Bruna Ribeiro
